item.title: Taking a Step Back: Starting With C
item.description: I’m going back in time, Sometimes taking a step back can move you forward. At my 2nd trimester at university I took SPL(Structured Programming Language) course. Where I first learned C programming and it was spring of 2012. After that from 2013 to 2015 I wrote a fair number of C code. I used to participate programming contests and I solved problems in different online judge. Now-a-days I don’t write C codes.

item.title: The Game Is On
item.description: 2-3 months ago, I was surfing the web and found an article titled Why I studied full-time for 8 months for a Google interview. The writer of this is John Washman, who is a self-taught web developer with 15 years of experience. While he was seeking a career change he wanted to join Google as Software Engineer. But he doesn’t have any computer science degree and doesn’t have the knowledge that large companies expect from candidates.
